properties.address: St Nicholas Church Hall, Great Wakering, Essex SS3 0AH
properties.description: We open the church hall on Wednesday from 12 noon to 2pm. All ages welcome - offering a light lunch with tea coffee and cake and companionship. Admission free - donations welcome.
properties.title: CAMEO

properties.address: Southend City Baptist Church, Essex SS1 1AN
properties.description: We are a Church Drop in that caters for adults over 18. We offer a warm space, friendship, hot snacks, drinks and good company. We help with signposting and advocating where needed. Can also supply Foodbank Vouchers.
properties.title: Daytime Drop in

properties.address: 57 West, 6 Clarence Road, Southend, Essex SS1 1AN
properties.description: Drop in with tea, coffee, biscuits and beans on toast
properties.title: Drop in

properties.address: Southend City Baptist Church, Southend on Sea, Essex SS1 1AN
properties.description: A safe space for adults to come and warm up and have a break from the streets. Hot snacks and Drinks provided. We also have sleeping bags for those that need them.
properties.title: Evening Drop in

properties.address: Minster-in-Sheppey Library, Worcester Close, Minster-On-Sea, Sheppey, Kent ME12 3NP
properties.description: Visit any of our libraries in Kent for a warm welcome. Browse our shelves, catch up with friends online with our free computer and WiFi access, or meet new people at one of our friendly social groups. Share a story, visit our cheery children's areas with little ones or pop along to one of our regular events. Many other services and partners also use libraries for drop-in surgeries. Please visit our website for services provided at your local library
properties.title: Minster-in-Sheppey Library

properties.description: Visit any of our libraries in Kent for a warm welcome. properties.address: Rushenden Wellbing Hub, Isle of Sheppey, Kent ME11 5LX ME11 5LX
properties.description: Our Warm Hub in Rushenden, Isle of Sheppey, is open to Queenborough and Rushenden residents, as well as all Southern Housing tenants. Join us every Wednesday from 12pm to 2pm for a hot meal, friendly faces, and uplifting activities — because everyone deserves a warm place to belong.
properties.title: Rushenden Warm Hub

properties.description: Visit any of our libraries in Kent for a warm welcome. properties.address: 163 High Street, Kent, Kent ME12 UH 1UH
properties.description: We have run a Warm Welcome Space during the winter months since 2022. We enjoy welcoming everyone who comes along, and love the fact that although we start off as strangers, we soon become friends.
properties.title: Sheerness Salvation Army

properties.address: Shoebury Youth Centre, Southend-on-Sea, Essex SS3 9NS
properties.title: Shoeburyness Library

properties.address: Southend On Sea Borough Council, Southend-on-Sea, Essex SS1 2XY
properties.title: Southchurch Library

properties.address: Southend On Sea Borough Council, Southend-on-Sea, Essex SS1 1NS
properties.description: The space is warm, welcome and open to all
properties.title: Southend Library - The Forum

properties.address: St George`s Parish Hall,, Shoeburyness, Essex SS3 9DH
properties.description: Everyone welcome. Free tea/coffee, biscuits, hot soup and a roll will be available. Take the opportunity to meet old acquaintances and new in our warm, friendly atmosphere.
properties.title: St George`s Warm Welcome Hub

properties.address: Sheerness Salvation Army Hall, Sheerness, Kent ME12 1UH
properties.description: Our Warm Welcome Space is a safe space where all are welcome. It's a place to be yourself! It's a place to make friends, to enjoy refreshments, to be creative, to read or play games. Everything in our Warm Welcome Space is free. We do have a shower that can be booked if that would be helpful to our guests. We do offer free use of our Wifi and offer the opportunity for our guests to charge their phones if that is required.
properties.title: The Hive - Sheerness Salvation Army's Warm Welcome Space

properties.address: Carnarvon Road, Southend on Sea, Essex SS2 6LR SS2 6LR
properties.description: A safe space offering hot meals twice a week (6–8:30pm), with access to showers, clothing, and hygiene products. Includes a women-only session on Mondays (4–5:15pm) and on-site physical, mental health and housing support.
properties.title: The One Love Project

properties.address: The Village Hall, Rochford, Essex SS4 3PG
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 25th November 2024** Open to everyone. Every Monday from 12 - 3pm. Free tea/coffee. Regular access to mental Health professionals, Community nurse, Local Councillors, Hug in a Shrug blankets/hats 7 mitts available to those who need them, Advice on benefits/housing, Domestic Abuse advice and more
properties.title: The Warm Hub
